name: part_005
file: tmp_【 #わため3D重大告知 】わため史上たぶん最大で最強の告知！【角巻わため⧸ホロライブ４期生】 [VYk1zdGfPzI]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: Watame chats with her illustrator 'mother', Fuumi-sensei, about her daily life and future collaboration plans.
Fuumi-sensei's presence suddenly disappears after Watame asks an inappropriate question, leading Watame to panic and mourn.
Watame pulls herself together and prepares to introduce the next guest.

subtitles.original: え、ふーみママも今、忙しいと思うんですけど...
subtitles.english: Uh, I think Fuumi-mother is also busy right now...

subtitles.original: 大丈夫？大丈夫？
subtitles.english: Are you okay? Are you okay?

subtitles.original: あ、元気だよ。
subtitles.english: Ah, I'm fine.

subtitles.original: 元気。え、いつ寝てんの？ふーみママ。
subtitles.english: You're fine. Uh, when do you sleep, Fuumi-mother?

subtitles.original: 気になる。
subtitles.english: I'm curious.

subtitles.original: なんか、うん、色んな時間に寝てる。
subtitles.english: Like, yeah, I sleep at various times.

subtitles.original: 色んな時間？
subtitles.english: Various times?

subtitles.original: 大体配信見てくれてるよね？なんか。
subtitles.english: You're usually watching my streams, right?

subtitles.original: なんか寝る時に寝てるかな。
subtitles.english: I guess I sleep when it's time to sleep.

subtitles.original: 寝る時に寝てる？
subtitles.english: You sleep when you sleep?

subtitles.original: ちゃんと寝てます。
subtitles.english: I'm sleeping properly.

subtitles.original: 何時間？
subtitles.english: For how many hours?

subtitles.original: 日による？ ７時間とかかな。
subtitles.english: Depends on the day? Maybe 7 hours or so.

subtitles.original: あ、結構寝てるね！
subtitles.english: Oh, you sleep quite a bit!

subtitles.original: わためも結構それぐらい寝てる。
subtitles.english: Watame also sleeps about that much.

subtitles.original: それならよかった。
subtitles.english: That's good then.

subtitles.original: 大丈夫だぜ！
subtitles.english: It's all good!

subtitles.original: ご飯何が好き？
subtitles.english: What kind of food do you like?

subtitles.original: ご飯はね、イタリアンとか。
subtitles.english: Food-wise, I like Italian and stuff.

subtitles.original: へー！今度一緒に行ってくれる？
subtitles.english: Oh! Will you go with me next time?

subtitles.original: あ、行きたい！
subtitles.english: Ah, I'd love to!

subtitles.original: 行きたい！
subtitles.english: You want to go!

subtitles.original: え、じゃあもう一個聞きたいのがある。
subtitles.english: Oh, then there's one more thing I want to ask.

subtitles.original: 今後わためとお絵かきコラボ配信とかする
subtitles.english: What is the probability of a future

subtitles.original: 可能性は何パーセントですか！？
subtitles.english: drawing collab stream with Watame!?

subtitles.original: これ、うわー、どうしようかな...
subtitles.english: This, wow, what should I do...

subtitles.original: なんか、いや、喋るのが苦手...
subtitles.english: Well, you see, I'm not good at talking...

subtitles.original: そうだよね、いや今日も...
subtitles.english: Right, well today too...

subtitles.original: ちょっとハードル高すぎ。どうしよう。
subtitles.english: The hurdle is a bit too high. What to do?

subtitles.original: 今日もね、出てくれるとは思わなかったよ。だめもとで頼んだ。
subtitles.english: I didn't think you'd appear today either. I just asked anyway.

subtitles.original: 断れないような...
subtitles.english: It felt like I couldn't refuse...

subtitles.original: 呼び出されてんの。あ、そうだ。
subtitles.english: You were summoned. Ah, that's right.

subtitles.original: あ、そうなんだ！
subtitles.english: Oh, I see!

subtitles.original: 断れなかったかー。
subtitles.english: So you couldn't say no.

subtitles.original: 圧に負けたか。
subtitles.english: Did you give in to the pressure?

subtitles.original: いや、やっぱりね、発表会だからね。うん。
subtitles.english: No, after all, it's an announcement event. Yeah.

subtitles.original: えー！やりたーい！また一緒に。
subtitles.english: Eh! I want to do it! Together again.

subtitles.original: じゃあ後で相談しましょう。
subtitles.english: Then let's discuss it later.

subtitles.original: やったー！来たー！みんな聞いたか！？言質取りましたよ！
subtitles.english: Yay! It's here! Everyone, did you hear that!? I got her word!

subtitles.original: イェーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: 楽しみだな。
subtitles.english: I'm looking forward to it.

subtitles.original: いや、絵を教えてほしいんだよ。
subtitles.english: No, I want you to teach me how to draw.

subtitles.original: 何使ってる？うん。
subtitles.english: What do you use?

subtitles.original: え、普通にお絵かきソフト...
subtitles.english: Uh, just normal drawing software...

subtitles.original: 何何？
subtitles.english: Which one?

subtitles.original: フォトショップ。
subtitles.english: Photoshop.

subtitles.original: あー！使ったことないんだよなー。
subtitles.english: Ah! I've never used that before.

subtitles.original: 私、クリスタしか使ったことないから、
subtitles.english: I've only used Clip Studio, so

subtitles.original: 教えてほしい、逆に。
subtitles.english: I want you to teach me, conversely.

subtitles.original: え、教えっこする？
subtitles.english: Eh, shall we teach each other?

subtitles.original: え、でも教えることないよ！そんな使いこなせないぜ。
subtitles.english: But I have nothing to teach! I can't use it that well.

subtitles.original: でもせっかく液タブ買ったから、
subtitles.english: But since I have a liquid tab...

subtitles.original: 買ったっていうか、買ってもらったんだけどさ。
subtitles.english: well, more like I had it bought for me.

subtitles.original: ドラゴンね。
subtitles.english: XP-Pen, right.

subtitles.original: 液タブ使えないんだよね。上手く書けない。
subtitles.english: I can't really use the liquid tab. I can't draw well.

subtitles.original: どうしたらいいと思う？
subtitles.english: What do you think I should do?

subtitles.original: 練習やっぱり...
subtitles.english: Practice, after all...

subtitles.original: あれ？ふーみママの霊圧が消えた！
subtitles.english: Huh? Fuumi-mother's presence disappeared!

subtitles.original: ふーみママ！
subtitles.english: Fuumi-mother!

subtitles.original: ふーみママ！！
subtitles.english: Fuumi-mother!!

subtitles.original: 霊圧が消えた！
subtitles.english: Her presence is gone!

subtitles.original: わあ！わためが！
subtitles.english: Waa! Watame...!

subtitles.original: パンチの色なんて聞いたから！
subtitles.english: It's because I asked about the color of her panties!

subtitles.original: そういうことだ！
subtitles.english: That's why!

subtitles.original: 履いてるか、履いてないか聞いたから！
subtitles.english: Because I asked if she was wearing them or not!

subtitles.original: バンされちゃったってこと！？
subtitles.english: Does that mean she got banned!?

subtitles.original: ふーみママがー！うー！
subtitles.english: Fuumi-mother is...! Uuu!

subtitles.original: なんて罪なことを！初めてなのに！
subtitles.english: What a sinful thing I've done! And it was our first time!

subtitles.original: 申し訳ねえぜ！
subtitles.english: I'm so sorry!

subtitles.original: ないなった。ふーみママないなった。
subtitles.english: She's gone. Fuumi-mother is gone.

subtitles.original: でもコメント、めっちゃ草生えてる。
subtitles.english: But the comments are full of 'grass' (lol).

subtitles.original: みんなもないなっとる。
subtitles.english: Everyone is also saying she's gone.

subtitles.original: でも今度コラボしたいね。
subtitles.english: But I want to collab next time.

subtitles.original: 絵、描いてほしいよな。
subtitles.english: I want her to draw for me.

subtitles.original: ね、みんなもさ、いつも配信とかでさ、
subtitles.english: Right, everyone, always in streams and stuff...

subtitles.original: ふーみママとコラボねーの？なーの？って言ってたからさ。
subtitles.english: you guys were asking if there was a collab with Fuumi-mother.

subtitles.original: やっと今回、お喋りしてるとこ見せられるって思ったんだけど...
subtitles.english: I thought I could finally show us chatting this time, but...

subtitles.original: ふーみママ連れ去られちゃった。
subtitles.english: Fuumi-mother was taken away.

subtitles.original: 連れ去られちゃった。
subtitles.english: She was taken away.

subtitles.original: さらわれちゃった。
subtitles.english: She was snatched away.

subtitles.original: あれ、そういえばキーワードももらってない、キーワードないなった！
subtitles.english: Oh, come to think of it, I haven't gotten the keyword. It's gone!

subtitles.original: キーワードないなったということは
subtitles.english: If the keyword is gone, that means

subtitles.original: 今日の重大告知も...ないなった！
subtitles.english: today's major announcement is also... gone!

subtitles.original: うー！
subtitles.english: Uuu!

subtitles.original: 悲しいぜ！うー！
subtitles.english: It's so sad! Uuu!

subtitles.original: でも、他にもね、まだ呼び出されてんだよね。
subtitles.english: But, there are others who have been summoned as well.

subtitles.original: もう...次の人に。
subtitles.english: Already... moving to the next person.
